title: Happy Birthday, Ruby
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Today’s party was a lot of fun~. My cheeks hurt from laughing so much<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, it really was. Ruby, once again, happy birthday<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Onee-chan…. Thank you. Has Ruby become a proper grown-up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Of course. However, that doesn’t mean growing up is all that’s important. Instead, it’s more important for you to smile as you always do, Ruby<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe…. As long as you’re here for me, Ruby will always have a smile, Onee-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Then I guess I’ll just have to be by your side forever<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then, will you hang out with me tomorrow? Look, tomorrow is also a holiday, right? Ruby wants to go around with you, Onee-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s right. It’s been a while, so let’s spend some together as sisters, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yaay~! Then, let’s go eat your favorite matcha sweets, Onee-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No, tomorrow we’re going to eat what you like and check out places you want to see, Ruby! Now, we need some plans!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
